courses.title: Code Sync
courses.description: An online collaborative code editor where you can write, debug, and execute code in real time, allowing your peers to see the changes as they happen

courses.title: Streamify
courses.description: Streamify is video streaming platform where user can upload videos in different quality ranges and a can share videos

courses.title: Vehicle Booking
courses.description: Built a secure Vehicle Booking System with JWT authentication, role-based access, Razorpay payments, and automated email notifications

courses.title: Performance tracker
courses.description: A npm package which is use to tell server perfromance like cpu usage, memory consumption, response time and uptime of a server
